title: So, what’s the over?
author: VD
content_html:
On the ratio of fouls called on the Celtics vs fouls called on the Lakers today? 3-1? 4-1?

With the same purpose as one of his in-your-face jumpers, Kobe Bryant leaned into the microphone.

He promised more NBA finals games to come.

“The series ain’t over,” he said. “It’s far from over.”

And the truth is, we all know that it isn’t. I don’t know where to check, but I’ll bet that Dick Bavetta reffing tonight in order to make sure that the series goes back to Boston.
content_text:
On
the ratio of fouls
called on the Celtics vs fouls called on the Lakers today?  3-1?  4-1?
With the same purpose as one of his in-your-face jumpers, Kobe Bryant leaned into the microphone.
He promised more NBA finals games to come.
“The series ain’t over,” he said. “It’s far from over.”
And the truth is, we all know that it isn’t.  I don’t know where to check, but I’ll bet that Dick Bavetta reffing tonight in order to make sure that the series goes back to Boston.
